page.title: 10Gardens
page.content: 90% of the people interviewed have gardens.Most of them have flowers and lawn and grow fruit and veg.Nobody is self_sufficient in fruit and vegetables although some people are working towards it.Mostly everybody uses farm manure but many also use artifical fertiliser.Most people use modern pesticides,a few use modern herbicides,but very few use modern fungicides.Only the odd one or two use their own natural remedies.The vegetables that are grown most are lettuce,cabbages,potatoes,carrots and onions.The fruits grown are mostly strawberries,gooseberries,apples and rhubarb.After four years the school has a garden which grows trees and flowers.Wild life now thrives with bluetits nesting in our bird_box for the first time ever.This year we planted a hanging basket & patio tubs.
